FLAVOUR_0_MEMBER_INTRO.message: Faodaidh sibh connadh a cheannach is cuidhteas fhaighinn de {radioactives} an-seo.

FLAVOUR_0_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: {clubname} is an independent organisation dedicated to providing discounted starship fuel to its members. Branches can be found throughout the galaxy. Benefits of membership include:

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_INTRO.message: Our own stocks of fuel, independent of the general market

LIST_BENEFITS_JOIN.message: Gabhaibh ballrachd an-dràsta! Chan eil ballrachd bliadhnail ach {membership_fee}

WE_WILL_ONLY_DISPOSE_OF.message: Cha ghabh sinn cùram air an uiread de {radioactives} ach na cheannaich sibh de {military_fuel} uainn.

WHAT_CONDITIONS_APPLY.message: Dè na cumhaichean ach an gabh sibh cùram de {radioactives}?

YOU_ARE_NOW_A_MEMBER.message: Tha thu 'nad bhall a-nis. Falbhaidh an ùine air do bhallrachd {expiry_date}.

YOU_MUST_BUY.message: Feumaidh sibh {military_fuel} a cheannach uainn mus gabh sinn ri ur {radioactives}
